message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1,000,000. What do you think?

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $1,000,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $900,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. This is my final offer, as I have another option available to me.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $925,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm willing to wait for the right buyer if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
